doc:
Adam Baldwin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adam_Baldwin 0 Adam Baldwin (born February 27, 1962) is an American actor. He starred in Full Metal Jacket (1987) as Animal Mother, as well as in the television series Firefly and its continuation film Serenity as Jayne Cobb. His roles include Stillman in Ordinary People (1980), Colonel John Casey in Chuck, and Mike Slattery in The Last Ship. Adam_Baldwin ( born February_27_,_1962 ) is an_American_actor . He starred in Full_Metal_Jacket_(_1987_) as Animal_Mother , as_well_as in the_television_series_Firefly and its_continuation_film_Serenity as Jayne_Cobb . His_roles include Stillman in Ordinary_People ( 1980_) , Colonel_John_Casey in Chuck , and Mike_Slattery in The_Last_Ship .
